post.description: Transfer a workspace owned by the authenticated user to another HydroServer user.

parameters.name: mode

schema.description: Specifies how new observations are added to the datastream. `insert` allows observations at any timestamp. `append` adds only future observations (after the latest existing timestamp). `backfill` adds only historical observations (before the earliest existing timestamp). `replace` deletes all observations in the range of provided observations before inserting new ones.
schema.title: Mode

parameters.description: Specifies how new observations are added to the datastream. `insert` allows observations at any timestamp. `append` adds only future observations (after the latest existing timestamp). `backfill` adds only historical observations (before the earliest existing timestamp). `replace` deletes all observations in the range of provided observations before inserting new ones.

post.description: Delete Datastream Observations between the given phenomenon start and end times.

mode.description: Specifies how new observations are added to the datastream. `insert` allows observations at any timestamp. `append` adds only future observations (after the latest existing timestamp). `backfill` adds only historical observations (before the earliest existing timestamp). `replace` deletes all observations in the range of provided observations before inserting new ones.
mode.title: Mode
